pages.text: $(thing)The Momotheism$() is a cult based around $(thing)Momo$(), a superior entity supposed to be able to control the world. This entity is in fact not real, and cult-acclaimed ritual responses are coming from an external, Déjà-vu-connected universe.
People within this cult are called $(thing)the Momotheists$(). They are mostly villagers who leave their villages in favor of the Momotheists Village, to study the religion full-time.
